description:
On November 22, 2025, cryptocurrency was stolen from two wallets that I had on my computer in soft wallets. I did not authorize these transactions and have not looked at these wallets in several months. The first unauthorized transaction was the attacker unstaked my Solana on November 20th. I only noticed this all today, December 6, 2025.The seed phrases for my Solana and Ethereum / Polygon wallets were stored in my NordPass password manager on my MacBook Air, and a NordPass recovery code was stored in a PDF in my Documents folder, which had been uploaded to iCloud Drive.I have not found evidence of obvious remote logins or malware, but based on the timing and the fact that my seed phrases and recovery code were stored on this device, I suspect my Mac, my NordPass vault, or the NordPass recovery code PDF may have been compromised.The hacker seemingly used my seed phrases stored in Nordpass to access my wallets, sent the funds to themselves through various transactions.I ran Malwarebytes scan and found no known malware on my computer.Transactions:Solana unstaking transactions:https://solscan.io/tx/jTYHSMQjCRHQ2RAPCDJhawi3bRxv3hreuyuMJrymXpBn3HQgyieboGJbA9Q2xGXHtPJKDp7Y8SEuFUz3BbinJQWhttps://solscan.io/tx/2eSgA1tkaJR9BBo6FfReBDUk3annje4DC33euZj9Sk79TkdEnFFKiBSRvLFKsCDzFEp7B72qyZ5mBT79ub8cPzj3https://solscan.io/tx/2Hu4ETjPRobxxcf26kLTBVpMLGw6Lw8NCDhGSZs5ru7ZebCEkSwJA3CHNpnacc7XsyoNxR9E8A44W7GpbVh5QoyDhttps://solscan.io/tx/oVm6j1WM1c6Zp3Ly7zTAQYunKxfccMdZAR5JZedX4gebx9bEnE2TRPZYctnwMqeoBu76VY31b38fN95keg4ep6qSolana transactions:Hacker converted HNT token to SOL on solana blockchain:https://solscan.io/tx/WxquWkNLXnWduHMDosT9Ws7tJRthB3hbXxSH6ZpgYqYNpAc6SCxRz9GGWSyrdBePZGUdGvrW9Zm6mQLZNSrX5kZHacker sent 66.38 SOL ($8K USD) to their own wallethttps://solscan.io/tx/67aD3EZcZEVgS1L1Ee7PatyBxQ6didhR8GfxfX82FnEYmJPFL9UqnF24X4SY2TLJUJv5heJhdJq8VRK7ED9mUEyJPolygon Blockchain:Hacker converted 0.281 WETH to MATIC (~$758.21)https://polygonscan.com/tx/0xc38a081f3b20b53edec1fccd1b1f5cdb1ae6f80e6c2d7ee01abbb765895111c7Hacker sent 5,984 MATIC to their wallet ($785.5)https://polygonscan.com/tx/0x55cc48109ef51ee0bd87fb9b7b17f129df10502b326ca8b86653277d4ff6f89dEthereum Blockchain:Hacker sent 0.25 ETH to their wallet ($677.71)https://etherscan.io/tx/0x3a983be96e998ae316061509f66606d2201154a426712352ebdc3cce6d95c549

On November 22, 2025, cryptocurrency was stolen from two wallets that I had on my computer in soft wallets. I did not authorize these transactions and have not looked at these wallets in several months. The first unauthorized transaction was the attacker unstaked my Solana on November 20th. I only noticed this all today, December 6, 2025.

The seed phrases for my Solana and Ethereum / Polygon wallets were stored in my NordPass password manager on my MacBook Air, and a NordPass recovery code was stored in a PDF in my Documents folder, which had been uploaded to iCloud Drive.

I have not found evidence of obvious remote logins or malware, but based on the timing and the fact that my seed phrases and recovery code were stored on this device, I suspect my Mac, my NordPass vault, or the NordPass recovery code PDF may have been compromised.

The hacker seemingly used my seed phrases stored in Nordpass to access my wallets, sent the funds to themselves through various transactions.

I ran Malwarebytes scan and found no known malware on my computer.Transactions:Solana unstaking transactions:

https://solscan.io/tx/jTYHSMQjCRHQ2RAPCDJhawi3bRxv3hreuyuMJrymXpBn3HQgyieboGJbA9Q2xGXHtPJKDp7Y8SEuFUz3BbinJQW

https://solscan.io/tx/2eSgA1tkaJR9BBo6FfReBDUk3annje4DC33euZj9Sk79TkdEnFFKiBSRvLFKsCDzFEp7B72qyZ5mBT79ub8cPzj3

https://solscan.io/tx/2Hu4ETjPRobxxcf26kLTBVpMLGw6Lw8NCDhGSZs5ru7ZebCEkSwJA3CHNpnacc7XsyoNxR9E8A44W7GpbVh5QoyD

https://solscan.io/tx/oVm6j1WM1c6Zp3Ly7zTAQYunKxfccMdZAR5JZedX4gebx9bEnE2TRPZYctnwMqeoBu76VY31b38fN95keg4ep6q

Solana transactions:

Hacker converted HNT token to SOL on solana blockchain:

https://solscan.io/tx/WxquWkNLXnWduHMDosT9Ws7tJRthB3hbXxSH6ZpgYqYNpAc6SCxRz9GGWSyrdBePZGUdGvrW9Zm6mQLZNSrX5kZ

Hacker sent 66.38 SOL ($8K USD) to their own wallet

https://solscan.io/tx/67aD3EZcZEVgS1L1Ee7PatyBxQ6didhR8GfxfX82FnEYmJPFL9UqnF24X4SY2TLJUJv5heJhdJq8VRK7ED9mUEyJ

Polygon Blockchain:

Hacker converted 0.281 WETH to MATIC (~$758.21)

https://polygonscan.com/tx/0xc38a081f3b20b53edec1fccd1b1f5cdb1ae6f80e6c2d7ee01abbb765895111c7

Hacker sent 5,984 MATIC to their wallet ($785.5)

https://polygonscan.com/tx/0x55cc48109ef51ee0bd87fb9b7b17f129df10502b326ca8b86653277d4ff6f89d

Ethereum Blockchain:

Hacker sent 0.25 ETH to their wallet ($677.71)

https://etherscan.io/tx/0x3a983be96e998ae316061509f66606d2201154a426712352ebdc3cce6d95c549

Amount lost

9824.41 USD
